name: LOLA Professional
ourMissionDescription: When it comes to the maintenance and management of your property LBT AG is the best address. Our company was founded in 1989 and has been continuously growing ever since. We are your competent, reliable partner for interior and exterior cleaning; garden services and plant care; property maintenance and relocation transportation.
cleaningDescription: A well cared-for property and clean rooms can make a major contribution to your company’s positive image. Why not simply put us in charge of this task?
propertyDescription: When it comes to the day-to-day handling of infrastructure a friendly, farsighted and efficient caretaker is indispensable. His all-round capabilities come to the fore in a diverse range of specialist areas, all requiring mutual trust.
relocationDescription: We coordinate and plan relocations and transports, carrying them out on schedule and with the greatest care and attention. We have the required know-how and conscientiousness to transport even bulky furniture; fragile materials and valuable items.
wasteDescription: Do you have large quantities of waste to dispose of? And are you surrounded by a sea of junk because there is no space for interim storage? Not a problem for us. We can dispose of waste for our customers – safely, professionally and in an environmentally friendly way.
